1.description: Has fully embraced her life with the Rats, the criminal gang. She has become hardened by her experiences and goes by the name Falka, showing how much she has changed from the innocent girl at Kaer Morhen.

3.description: Her time with the Rats comes to a violent end, but not before she has committed acts that weigh heavily on her conscience. She begins to face the consequences of her choices.

7.description: Begins to travel between worlds using her Elder Blood powers, experiencing visions of different times and places. Her abilities are growing beyond anyone's understanding.

9.description: Her journey through different worlds shows her possible futures and pasts, helping her understand the scope of her powers and destiny.

4.description: Continues his relentless search for Ciri with his company, following increasingly dangerous leads. His determination has not wavered despite the growing obstacles.

6.description: Faces increasingly dangerous opposition as he gets closer to finding Ciri. His company remains loyal despite the mounting risks.

9.description: Finally gets concrete information about Ciri's location and the forces arrayed against her. Prepares for the final confrontation to rescue her.

2.description: A ruthless bounty hunter and professional killer who wears the medallions of three witchers he has defeated. He is hired to capture Ciri and proves to be one of the most dangerous opponents she has faced.

4.description: Keeps Ciri as his prisoner, forcing her to fight in arena matches for his entertainment and profit. He takes sadistic pleasure in breaking her spirit.

6.description: Continues to hold Ciri captive while using her abilities for his own gain. His cruelty knows no bounds as he systematically breaks down her resistance.

1.description: A gang of young criminals who have taken Ciri in as one of their own. They engage in robbery and violence, with Ciri becoming fully integrated into their criminal lifestyle.

3.description: Meet their violent end when their criminal activities finally catch up with them. Their destruction serves as a turning point in Ciri's journey.

4.description: Continues as the company's primary archer and tracker, her skills proving invaluable in their dangerous quest. She remains fiercely loyal to Geralt and their mission.

6.description: Faces personal struggles that affect her ability to contribute to the mission, but her dedication to finding Ciri never wavers.

4.description: His true nature as a vampire becomes more apparent as the company faces increasingly dangerous situations. His supernatural abilities make him invaluable to their quest.

8.description: Reveals more of his vampiric abilities and past, showing the full extent of his commitment to helping rescue Ciri despite the personal cost.

4.description: Has fully earned the trust of the company through his actions and dedication. His knowledge of Nilfgaard continues to be valuable as they navigate political dangers.

8.description: Proves his complete commitment to rescuing Ciri, showing that his redemption from his past actions at Cintra is genuine and complete.

4.description: Continues to serve as the company's chronicler and voice of reason, though he struggles with the increasing violence and danger of their quest.

5.description: Pursues her own investigation into Ciri's disappearance, using her magical abilities and political connections to gather information.

9.description: Her investigation leads her closer to the truth about Vilgefortz's plans and Ciri's location. She prepares to reunite with Geralt for the final rescue attempt.

6.description: His true plans regarding Ciri become clearer as he works from his stronghold. His obsession with her powers drives his increasingly desperate actions.

9.description: Prepares for the final confrontation, knowing that Geralt and his allies are closing in. His magical power and cunning make him a formidable opponent.

2.description: Continues working for Vilgefortz in hunting Ciri, his scarred face a testament to his previous encounters with her protectors.

7.description: An Aen Elle elf who appears to Ciri during her interdimensional travels. He claims to want to help her understand and control her Elder Blood powers.

9.description: Reveals more about the Elder Blood and Ciri's true importance in the larger cosmic conflict. His motivations remain somewhat mysterious.

relationships.Ciri: Primary teacher of Elder Blood powers

7.description: The leader of the Wild Hunt who pursues Ciri through different worlds. He represents a supernatural threat that transcends normal political conflicts.

5.description: A Nilfgaardian agent working for Emperor Emhyr who becomes involved in the hunt for Ciri, representing the empire's continued interest in her.
The Nilfgaardian sorceress continues to represent the empire's magical interests in capturing Ciri, working through political channels.

7.description: A hermit who finds and cares for Ciri after she is injured during her interdimensional travels. He provides a safe haven and helps her recover.

1.description: The leader of the Rats gang and Ciri's lover. He is charismatic but violent, representing the dark path Ciri has chosen.

3.description: Dies in the violent end of the Rats, showing the inevitable consequences of their criminal lifestyle.

1.description: A member of the Rats gang, young and ruthless. He participates in their criminal activities with enthusiasm.

3.description: Meets his end along with the rest of the gang when Bonhart destroys them.

1.description: Another member of the Rats, known for his skill with weapons and his loyalty to the gang.
A Rats gang member who serves as one of their scouts and planners. He helps organize their criminal operations.
The youngest member of the Rats before Ciri joined. He looks up to the older gang members and tries to prove himself.
The only female member of the Rats besides Ciri. She has a complex relationship with Ciri that goes beyond simple friendship.

2.description: Her relationship with Ciri deepens, showing another aspect of Ciri's transformation and the bonds formed in extreme circumstances.

5.description: A powerful Skellige jarl who becomes involved in the search for Ciri. He represents the strength and honor of Skellige culture.
Son of Crach an Craite, a young and ambitious Skellige warrior eager to prove himself in battle and adventure.
Daughter of Crach an Craite, known for her intelligence and wisdom beyond her years. She represents the new generation of Skellige leaders.
An unpredictable Skellige jarl known for his violent temper and erratic behavior. He represents the more savage aspects of Skellige culture.
Former King of Cintra through marriage to Calanthe, and a respected Skellige warrior. His memory influences current Skellige politics.

4.description: A skilled arena fighter who faces Ciri in the fighting pits. He represents the brutal entertainment that Bonhart forces Ciri into.
A massive arena fighter known for his size and strength. Ciri must use her speed and training to survive against him.
The dwarf who runs the arena where Ciri is forced to fight. He profits from the blood sport while pretending neutrality.

6.description: A Nilfgaardian agent and bounty hunter pursuing Ciri for the Emperor. He represents the political forces seeking to capture her.
A professional bounty hunter working with Skellen to capture Ciri. He represents the mercenary forces drawn into the hunt.
Another bounty hunter in Skellen's group, known for tracking skills and ruthless efficiency in pursuing targets.

7.description: A young scholar studying ancient texts and prophecies. She represents the academic pursuit of knowledge about Ciri's powers.
An older scholar researching the historical events surrounding Ciri and Geralt. She provides historical perspective on current events.

8.description: A temple guard captain who becomes involved in protecting scholars and maintaining order during chaotic times.

7.description: One of the Wild Hunt riders pursuing Ciri through different dimensions. He represents the supernatural threat beyond mortal concerns.
A powerful Wild Hunt general who leads their forces in pursuit of Ciri. His presence terrifies even experienced warriors.
An ancient Aen Elle elf who provides context for Avallac'h's teachings to Ciri. He represents the deep history of elven knowledge.
A unicorn who appears to Ciri during her interdimensional travels, serving as a guide and protector against dark forces.

8.description: The king of the Aen Elle elves who has his own plans for Ciri's Elder Blood. He represents the political complexity of different worlds.

9.description: A member of the Lodge of Sorceresses who has her own agenda regarding Ciri's fate and the future of magic.

8.description: A mysterious figure Ciri encounters during her travels through time and space, representing the Arthurian connections in her journey.

1.description: The charismatic leader of the Rats gang and Ciri's lover. He represents the dark path Ciri has chosen in her desperation.

3.description: Dies violently along with the rest of the Rats when Bonhart destroys the gang, marking the end of Ciri's criminal phase.

9.description: The powerful sorceress and spymaster continues her political machinations, seeking to control Ciri for her own agenda.
Works with other sorceresses in the Lodge, though she maintains some sympathy for Geralt and Ciri's situation.
A Lodge sorceress and former Rectress of Aretuza who participates in the political schemes surrounding Ciri.
An elven sorceress and member of the Lodge who represents elven interests in their political schemes.
A Nilfgaardian sorceress who serves the empire's interests within the Lodge of Sorceresses.

4.description: The youngest member of Geralt's company who proves her worth through courage and loyalty despite her criminal past.

7.description: The fearsome leader of the Wild Hunt who pursues Ciri across worlds and dimensions for his own dark purposes.
A Wild Hunt navigator with powerful ice magic who helps track Ciri through different worlds and times.
A brutal Wild Hunt general known for his fighting prowess and cruelty in hunting their targets.

5.description: The Emperor of Nilfgaard who has his own mysterious personal interest in Ciri that goes beyond politics.

2.description: A professional bounty hunter who works with Bonhart in tracking down and capturing valuable targets.

1.description: A member of the Rats gang who participates in their criminal activities alongside Ciri and the others.

5.description: A Skellige warrior who serves under Crach an Craite, representing the maritime warrior culture of the islands.
A powerful druid from Skellige who has knowledge of ancient magic and the Elder Blood prophecies.
A high-ranking Nilfgaardian intelligence officer who coordinates the empire's efforts to locate and capture Ciri.

4.description: A dwarf crime boss who runs fighting arenas where Bonhart forces Ciri to compete for entertainment and profit.
A massive arena fighter who serves as one of Ciri's opponents in the fighting pits, representing the brutal entertainment.

7.description: A priestess of Melitele who provides healing and sanctuary, representing the religious forces trying to help in the conflict.

6.description: A member of Stefan Skellen's bounty hunting group, skilled in tracking and combat.
Another member of Skellen's group, specializing in interrogation and intimidation.
A scout in Skellen's bounty hunting operation, expert at finding and following trails.

7.description: A villager living near Vysogota's swamp dwelling, occasionally trading supplies with the hermit.
An elderly village woman who knows Vysogota and sometimes brings him news from the outside world.

4.description: A deadly arena fighter known for using poisoned weapons against opponents.
A veteran arena fighter with years of experience in brutal combat entertainment.
A trainer who prepares fighters for arena combat, including teaching Ciri fighting techniques.
A medic who tends to wounded fighters after arena matches, keeping them alive for future fights.

6.description: A professional tracker specializing in finding people who don't want to be found.

7.description: A hermit living deep in the swamplands, knowledgeable about swamp lore and healing herbs.
A guide who knows the dangerous paths through the swamplands and helps travelers navigate safely.

6.description: A guard captain at one of the castles involved in the political machinations surrounding Ciri.
A servant in the castle who overhears conversations and witnesses political plotting.

7.description: A skilled healer who specializes in herbal medicine and treats various ailments.
An herbalist who gathers medicinal plants and creates healing potions and remedies.
A Wild Hunt scout who searches for Ciri across different dimensions and worlds.

8.description: A member of the Aen Elle court who serves under Auberon Muircetach.
An elven court member who observes and reports on political developments.

9.description: A messenger who carries communications between Lodge of Sorceresses members.
A spy working for the Lodge of Sorceresses to gather intelligence on their enemies.

5.description: A mid-ranking Nilfgaardian officer involved in the search operations for Ciri.

7.description: A being Ciri encounters during her interdimensional travels, representing the mysteries of the multiverse.

8.description: A mystical guardian of temporal boundaries that Ciri encounters during her time travels.

7.description: The elder of a village near the swamplands where Vysogota lives.
A wise woman from the swamp village who knows old traditions and folklore.
A bandit leader operating in the swamplands, preying on travelers and traders.
A lieutenant in the swamp bandit gang, skilled in ambush tactics.
A brave merchant who trades in the dangerous swamplands despite the risks.
An operator who runs a ferry service across dangerous swamp waters.
A fisherman who works the swamp waters, providing food for local communities.
A hunter who specializes in tracking game through the treacherous swamplands.

6.description: A family leader guiding a group of refugees through dangerous territories.
A young orphan traveling with refugee groups, representing the innocent victims of conflict.

4.description: The announcer who introduces fighters and entertains the crowd during arena matches.
The person who manages betting on arena fights, taking wagers from spectators.
A guard who maintains order in the arena and prevents fighters from escaping.

6.description: An underground information broker who trades in secrets and intelligence.
A tavern keeper at a crossroads who serves travelers and gathers news.
A smuggler captain who operates secret transport routes for people and goods.

7.description: A fortune teller who claims to see the future and provides cryptic advice to travelers.

4.description: A street performer who entertains crowds near the arena and gathers information.

6.description: A dock worker who loads and unloads ships, witnessing the movement of people and goods.
A merchant ship captain who transports goods and passengers between ports.

8.description: A lighthouse keeper who guides ships safely to shore and observes sea traffic.
A pirate captain who preys on merchant ships and operates outside the law.
A guide who knows the dangerous mountain passes and helps travelers navigate them.
A hermit living in mountain caves who occasionally helps lost travelers.

5.description: A royal messenger carrying important dispatches between kingdoms and nobles.
A court scribe who records important political events and meetings.
A guard assigned to protect diplomats and important officials during travel.

6.description: A border patrol officer monitoring crossings and tracking suspicious movement.
An inspector who examines goods and documents at border crossings.

7.description: A scholar researching ancient prophecies and magical phenomena.
A keeper of ancient libraries who protects and organizes important texts.
A monk living in a monastery who provides sanctuary and spiritual guidance.
A young acolyte serving in the temple, learning religious duties and rituals.

8.description: A reporter documenting the ongoing conflicts and their effects on people.
A survivor of various conflicts who serves as a witness to important events.

4.description: A wealthy noble who attends arena fights for entertainment and places large bets.
A merchant who attends arena fights and conducts business deals in the stands.
The master of arms who maintains and supplies weapons for arena fighters.

6.description: A contact in the underground network who facilitates illegal activities and information trading.
A keeper of safe houses who provides temporary shelter to people in hiding.
A guide who knows secret escape routes and helps people flee dangerous situations.
A skilled forger who creates false documents and identity papers.
A fence who buys and sells stolen goods, operating in the criminal underworld.

4.description: A loan shark who lends money at high interest rates and enforces payment through violence.
An enforcer who collects debts and intimidates enemies for criminal organizations.
A skilled pickpocket who steals from arena crowds and busy marketplaces.
A leader among street orphans who organizes them for survival in the city.
The head of a beggar network who organizes information gathering through the city's poorest.
A waste collector who sees and hears everything while cleaning up after others.
A night watchman who patrols the streets and observes nocturnal activities.

7.description: A caretaker of cemeteries who tends to graves and sometimes witnesses secretive meetings.
A midwife who helps with births and provides healing services to women and children.
A village storyteller who preserves local folklore and entertains with tales.

6.description: A market vendor who sells goods and overhears conversations from customers.
A professional guard hired to protect merchant caravans during travel.
A highway bandit who robs travelers and merchants on the roads.
An official who collects tolls and taxes from travelers using roads and bridges.
A keeper who maintains bridges and monitors who crosses them.

7.description: A pilot who guides boats through dangerous river passages and rapids.
An operator who runs a water mill for grinding grain and processing materials.

8.description: A person who observes weather patterns and provides forecasts for travelers.
A navigator who uses stars and celestial bodies to guide travelers and ships.
A cartographer who creates maps and charts of territories and routes.
A chronicler who documents travels and discoveries made during journeys.

7.description: A mysterious entity that observes travelers between dimensions, including Ciri's journeys.

recaps.1: Ciri has fully embraced life with the Rats criminal gang, taking on the name Falka and participating in their violent activities. Her transformation from innocent princess to hardened criminal is complete.
recaps.2: The bounty hunter Leo Bonhart tracks down the Rats, beginning a campaign of terror against them. His reputation as a killer of witchers makes him one of the most dangerous opponents Ciri has faced.
recaps.3: Bonhart destroys the Rats in a violent confrontation, killing most of the gang and capturing Ciri. This marks the end of her criminal phase and the beginning of a new form of captivity.
recaps.4: Geralt's company continues their relentless search for Ciri while she is held prisoner by Bonhart, who forces her to fight in arena matches for entertainment and profit.
recaps.5: Various factions including Nilfgaard continue hunting for Ciri while Bonhart maintains his cruel hold over her. Yennefer pursues her own investigation into Ciri's disappearance.
recaps.6: The political situation becomes increasingly complex as multiple parties converge on Ciri's location. Vilgefortz's true plans begin to become clearer as he prepares his final moves.
recaps.7: Ciri begins experiencing interdimensional travel, visiting different worlds and times. She encounters the Aen Elle elves including Avallac'h, who claims to want to help her understand her Elder Blood powers.
recaps.8: Ciri's journey through different dimensions continues as she learns more about her powers and destiny. Meanwhile, Geralt's company and other factions prepare for a final confrontation.
recaps.9: The various storylines begin to converge as Ciri's interdimensional journey brings her closer to understanding her true role in the cosmic conflict. Geralt and Yennefer prepare to reunite their efforts.
recaps.10: All parties move toward the final confrontation as Ciri's location becomes known. The stage is set for the climactic battle that will determine her fate and the future of the world.
